verses.verse: And I said <S%H559><s%>, Hear <S%H8085><s%>, I pray you <S%H7218><s%>, O heads of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and you princes <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>; Is it not for you to know <S%H3045><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>?

Who hate <S%H8130><s%> the good <S%H2896><s%>, and love <S%H157><s%> the evil <S%H7451><s%>; who pluck off <S%H1497><s%> their skin <S%H5785><s%> from off them <S%H7607><s%>, and their flesh from off their bones <S%H6106><s%>;

Who also eat <S%H398><s%> the flesh <S%H7607><s%> of my people <S%H5971><s%>, and flay <S%H6584><s%> their skin <S%H5785><s%> from off them <S%H6476><s%>; and they break their bones <S%H6106><s%>, and chop them in pieces <S%H6566><s%>, as for the pot <S%H5518><s%>, and as flesh <S%H1320><s%> inside <S%H8432><s%> the caldron <S%H7037><s%>.

Then shall they cry <S%H2199><s%> unto the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, but he will not hear <S%H6030><s%> them <S%H5641><s%>: he will even hide his face <S%H6440><s%> from them at that time <S%H6256><s%>, as they have behaved themselves ill <S%H7489><s%> in their doings <S%H4611><s%>.

Thus says <S%H559><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> concerning the prophets <S%H5030><s%> that make my people <S%H5971><s%> err <S%H8582><s%>, that bite <S%H5391><s%> with their teeth <S%H8127><s%>, and cry <S%H7121><s%>, Peace <S%H7965><s%>; and he that puts <S%H5414><s%> not into their mouths <S%H6310><s%>, they even prepare <S%H6942><s%> war against him <S%H4421><s%>.

Therefore night <S%H3915><s%> shall be unto you <S%H2377><s%>, that you shall not have a vision; and it shall be dark <S%H2821><s%> unto you <S%H7080><s%>, that you shall not divine; and the sun <S%H8121><s%> shall go down <S%H935><s%> over the prophets <S%H5030><s%>, and the day <S%H3117><s%> shall be dark over them <S%H6937><s%>.

Then shall the seers <S%H2374><s%> be ashamed <S%H954><s%>, and the diviners <S%H7080><s%> confounded <S%H2659><s%>: Yes <S%H5844><s%>, they shall all cover their lips <S%H8222><s%>; for there is no answer <S%H4617><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>.

But truly <S%H199><s%> I am full <S%H4390><s%> of power <S%H3581><s%> by the spirit <S%H7307><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and of judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and of might <S%H1369><s%>, to declare <S%H5046><s%> unto Jacob <S%H3290><s%> his transgression <S%H6588><s%>, and to Israel <S%H3478><s%> his sin <S%H2403><s%>.

Hear <S%H8085><s%> this <S%H7218><s%>, I pray you, you heads of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jacob <S%H3290><s%>, and princes <S%H7101><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, that abhor <S%H8581><s%> judgment <S%H4941><s%>, and pervert <S%H6140><s%> all equity <S%H3477><s%>.
They build up <S%H1129><s%> Zion <S%H6726><s%> with blood <S%H1818><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> with iniquity <S%H5766><s%>.

The heads <S%H7218><s%> there judge <S%H8199><s%> for reward <S%H7810><s%>, and the priests <S%H3548><s%> there teach <S%H3384><s%> for hire <S%H4242><s%>, and the prophets <S%H5030><s%> there divine <S%H7080><s%> for money <S%H3701><s%>: yet will they lean <S%H8172><s%> upon the Lord <S%H3068><s%>, and say <S%H559><s%>, Is not the Lord <S%H3068><s%> among <S%H7130><s%> us <S%H7451><s%>? no evil can come upon us <S%H935><s%>.

Therefore shall Zion <S%H6726><s%> for your sake <S%H1558><s%> be plowed <S%H2790><s%> as a field <S%H7704><s%>, and Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> shall become heaps <S%H5856><s%>, and the mountain <S%H2022><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> as the high places <S%H1116><s%> of the forest <S%H3293><s%>.
